org.apache.solr.rest

Class ManagedResourceStorage.InMemoryStorageIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.solr.rest.ManagedResourceStorage.InMemoryStorageIO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ManagedResourceStorage.StorageIO
    Enclosing class:
    ManagedResourceStorage

    public static class ManagedResourceStorage.InMemoryStorageIO
extends Object
implements ManagedResourceStorage.StorageIO
    Memory-backed storage IO; not really intended for storage large amounts of data in production, but useful for testing and other transient workloads.
